tool_description: PresentID Speaker verification API checks whether two voices belong to the same person or not. This capability is potentially useful in call centers.

api_list.name: Send voice with voice file
api_list.description: This API checks whether two voices belong to one person or not. The voice must be between three seconds and one minute and must not exceed 5 MB. Supported file types include wav, mp3, m4a, FLAC, aac, and ogg.

required_parameters.name: sound1
required_parameters.description: The first voice file to be verified.

required_parameters.name: sound2
required_parameters.description: The second voice file to be verified.

api_list.name: Send voice with Base64
api_list.description: This API checks whether two voices belong to one person or not. The voice must be between three seconds and one minute and must not exceed 5 MB. Supported file types include wav, mp3, m4a, FLAC, aac, and ogg.

required_parameters.name: sound1Base64
required_parameters.description: Base64 encoded string of the first voice file.

required_parameters.name: sound2Base64
required_parameters.description: Base64 encoded string of the second voice file.

api_list.name: Send voice with Voice URL
api_list.description: This API checks whether two voices belong to one person or not. The voice must be between three seconds and one minute and must not exceed 5 MB. Supported file types include wav, mp3, m4a, FLAC, aac, and ogg.

required_parameters.name: linkFile1
required_parameters.description: URL of the first voice file.

required_parameters.name: linkFile2
required_parameters.description: URL of the second voice file.
